0.1.name: wordpress/thumbs-updown
0.1.description: Rating plugin that automaticly adds rating panel below the content. It has red-green rating line, just like on youtube. You can change text of buttons or other options in plugin's settings. Made using functions of 'Love It' (Pippin Williamson) plugin. It's temporary, I am going to rewrite it in the next version. This is my very first plugin. So if you want to give a piece of advice - I would be very happy.
